Hazel: No!

Hazel smiles and walks up to Nightlight, looking her right in t=
he optics.

Hazel: I think this tour is done...Show me to my quarters...I w=
ant to be ALONE....

Hazel warm smile takes a turn of evil as her optics na=
rrow.

Hazel: Understand? I need my privacy...You lead the way.

Hazel step=
s backwards twice, away from Nightlight and waits for Nightlight to lead th=
e way. Hazel's comrades stare coldly at Nightlight...
  ----- Original Mess=
age ----- 
  From: airly2000@... 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com

t: Thursday, November 15, 2001 12:27 AM
  Subject: Hazel


  Nightlight::

=
  Nighlight nodded but inside her she had a bad feeling. She looked to 
  H=
azel and the others and said "Follow me I'll show you the base... "
